channel.title: 3 Simple Tasks I need help with
channel.description:
First of all MERRY CHRISTMAS! =D.
Secondly. I am using Deltascape source. (Kinda like Rubsca)
I have been looking all over moparscape and google, googled everything...and i cant find how to add NPC's, and too change there drops.
And.
I cant find how to change the prices in the shops.cfg. (I know your going to say after the itemID add the price, but all that does it change the quantity.) Any help whatsoever will be appreciated.
Thanks Guys. Even posting a link to another tutorial is super helpful.

item.title: 3 Simple Tasks I need help with
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“Tatemo, post:11, topic:252797”]Ohhhhh i believe u just broke a rule well done -pats back- guess that big name of urs also has a big ego.

Rule 3:
Post count, rep and statuses don’t mean anything, post count and rep can be abused, and people change over time.[/quote]How is that a rule? You broke more than 1 rule. 1) Use common sense. 2) We don’t make spelling mistakes on purpose. We use “you” not “u”, we use “why” not “y” etc. 3) We don’t make posts that contain not useful information. Posts like “cool”, “lol”, “yeah” and “I agree” don’t contain anything useful for others. We are not fans of off topic, unless it contains something smart or funny. Most of things spammers find funny are actually not funny at all.

But you really are a no-namer, I’m a senior member and I am well known, whereas I’ve never heard of you before until today.

Read full topic

item.title: 3 Simple Tasks I need help with
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Ya, it doesn’t matter what source you’re using. damn near all 317 servers have the same configuration. items.cfg controls bonuses, and prices. the first 3 are sell, general buy price, and specialty buy price iirc. And then in the shops.cfg, just put in item, and amount, and such, in autospawn.cfg, spawn the npc where you want it, and in the client.java, search for “WanneShop”, and just copy the if statement, and replace what you need to fit your shop.

Read full topic
item.source: 3 Simple Tasks I need help with

item.title: 3 Simple Tasks I need help with
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

For the shops thing to change the price open ur item.cfg thing

Next up search the id of the item u want to change the price of

Then u should see
the name of the item plus id the examine and then 3 very long numbers or sometimes short followed by lots of smaller numbers

item = 1949	Fighter_hat	A_partially_charged_rod.	1	35	1	5	5	5	-7	-7	27	29	26	-3	28	0	0

So the first three numbers after a partially charged rod are the alch sell and buy amounts.(i think its that order it might be the other way round) Anyway i know it sells for 35 points from the assult shop so the one that is sell must be the middle one. Anyone to change the amount that the item sells for in the shop just change the 35 to whatever and then compile and run.

Next to add npcs

Open Autospawn.cfg and u should see lots of lines along the line of

spawn = 104	2900	9847	0	0	0	0	0	2	Ghost

This means that it will spawn a ghost(id 104) at the coords 2900 9847. Now the next 5 zeros im pretty sure are spots it will walk to(not quite sure i wanna check it out) the 2 at the end is the height (ground = 0 1st floor = 1 2nd = 2 and so on basement = -1) It says ghost at the end so you know what it is if u wanna change stuff
Now to spawn new npcs copy and paste the last line before end of spawn list and change the id to the monster u want and the coords to wherever u want

Read full topic
